root.name: The Adventures of Down Under Dan
root.description: 'The Adventures of Down Under Dan' was a DOS game released in the year 1995. Boasting 'photorealistic settings and digitised video animations', the game took place in Australia. Players took on the role of 'Down Under Dan', a pilot who crash landed in the Australian Outback. Players are given four in-game days to explore the culture and effectively get back to civilization. Like many games of the time, it features an inventory system referred to as a 'backpack', where you may gather objects that may be of use or value.
